name: Iggy's Egg Adventure
blurb: Iggy\u2019s Egg Adventure is an Indie Game being developed by Ginger Labs. It is a 2.5D prehistoric platformer inspired by the classics!

rewards.reward:
Digital Copy of Iggy's Egg Adventure 
+ All Preorder Content
==============================
A code to download the full version of the game once it is complete, as well as a Steam Code for the game (Support us on Steam Greenlight!), plus any preorder content released with the game (check the Rewards for more details.)

Digital Soundtrack +
Digital Copy of Iggy's Egg Adventure + All Preorder Content
==============================
Digital Soundtrack featured in Iggy's Egg Adventure (by Zack Maltzman)! Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

3 Unique Buttons + All Previous Rewards\r\n==============================\r\nGet 3 Unique Buttons to show off your support for Iggy's Egg Adventure and Ginger Labs LLC! Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

Iggy Mouse Pad + All Previous Rewards\r\n==============================\r\nGet a custom made Iggy's Egg Adventure mouse pad to use while you play (or to take up space on your desk if you are using a controller!) Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

Iggy T-Shirt (available in M, L, or XL) + All Previous Rewards\r\n============================== \r\nShow off your love for Iggy with a Iggy's Egg Adventure T-shirt! Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

Iggy's Egg Adventure and Ginger Labs Posters + All Previous Rewards\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes two awesome posters to hang on your wall, one of Iggy and the other showing off the Ginger Labs logo! Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

Iggy Baseball Cap + All Previous Rewards\r\n============================== \r\n"Top" it all off with a sweet hat to match the shirt, buttons, and all the other cool stuff! Includes all previous rewards (check the Rewards section for more details.)

Feature in Credits (includes Name, Quote, and custom 8-bit Portrait) + All Previous Rewards
============================== 
Don't be just another name in a long and boring list, be FEATURED in the credits for Iggy's Egg Adventure. This will get you a custom made 8-bit Icon based off of your picture, your name, and a quote you would like to put in the credits!
Includes all previous rewards (GINGER LABS LLC RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DENY INAPPROPRIATE CONTENT, check the Rewards section for more details.)

Handmade Iggy Plushy (LIMITED) + Digital Copy of Iggy's Egg Adventure + All Preorder Rewards + Digital Soundtrack\r\n============================== \r\nGet a HANDMADE Iggy plushy to snuggle up with while you play the game! This plushy measures ~1 ft tall by ~1ft wide and is made from fleece so it soft to the touch. This plushy is in very limit quantities and will be delivered upon completion (check the Rewards section for more details.)

The Whole Package. This includes ALL Previous Rewards (Includes Handmade Iggy Plushy regardless of available quantity!) + Iggy Hoodie\r\n============================== \r\nThis package comes with an Iggy Hoodie available only through this Kickstarter and a custom handmade Iggy Plushy! Includes ALL previous rewards (NOTE: Only includes 1 Iggy Plushy. check the Rewards section for more details.)

The Prehistoric Package. Become Immortalized in Digital Form! + ALL Previous Rewards
============================== 
Ever wanted to be IN a video game? Here is your chance! One backer will be immortalized in caveman or cavewoman form in Iggy's Egg Adventure. Send us a picture of yourself or someone you wish to be in the game (if purchased as a gift) and we will personally make a Caveman or Cavewoman and feature them in the game. We will be in direct contact with you during the creation process and will keep you up-to-date on the progress. You will also get an autographed photo of the Ginger Labs team, with a personal greeting to whoever you would like to receive this. Includes all previous rewards.
(NOTE: Only includes 1 Iggy Plushy. GINGER LABS LLC RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DENY INAPPROPRIATE CONTENT, check the Rewards section for more details.)
